name: test_NAF_14_2_0_verify_post_fields_after_sending
description:
Test Case: NAF-268
    As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community
    Scenario: Verify post fields after sending
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "Community" tab
    3. Click "NEW POST" button
    4. Verify post input field is present and editable
    5. Enter text content
    6. Click "Post" button
    7. Verify post fields are cleared after sending
    
    Expected Result: Post input field should be present, editable, and cleared after posting
descriptionHtml:
Test Case: NAF-268
As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community
Scenario: Verify post fields after sending

Steps:
1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
2. Go to "Community" tab
3. Click "NEW POST" button
4. Verify post input field is present and editable
5. Enter text content
6. Click "Post" button
7. Verify post fields are cleared after sending

Expected Result: Post input field should be present, editable, and cleared after posting
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Did not return to community page after posting
assert False
 +  where False = <bound method CommunityPage.is_community_title_present of <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x103570550>>()
 +    where <bound method CommunityPage.is_community_title_present of <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x103570550>> = <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x103570550>.is_community_title_present
statusTrace:
self = <test_14_Community.TestCommunityManagement object at 0x103572650>
setup_and_teardown = <appium.webdriver.webdriver.WebDriver (session="08616c45-126c-4da4-b731-e7f185e0694c")>

    @allure.story("14.2.0 As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.CRITICAL)
    @allure.description("""
    Test Case: NAF-268
    As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community
    Scenario: Verify post fields after sending
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "Community" tab
    3. Click "NEW POST" button
    4. Verify post input field is present and editable
    5. Enter text content
    6. Click "Post" button
    7. Verify post fields are cleared after sending
    
    Expected Result: Post input field should be present, editable, and cleared after posting
    """)
    def test_NAF_14_2_0_verify_post_fields_after_sending(self, setup_and_teardown):
        driver = setup_and_teardown
        community_page = CommunityPage(driver)
    
        # 1. Click NEW POST button
        assert community_page.click_new_post_button(), "NEW POST button not found"
        sleep(2)
    
        # 2. Verify we're on the new post page
        assert community_page.is_new_post_page(), "Did not enter NEW POST page"
    
        # 3. Verify post input field is present and editable
        try:
            input_element = driver.find_element('xpath', "//android.widget.EditText")
            assert input_element.is_enabled(), "Post input field is not enabled"
        except Exception as e:
            assert False, f"Post input field not found: {str(e)}"
    
        # 4. Enter text content
        post_text = 'Test post fields ' + ''.join(random.choices(string.ascii_letters + string.digits, k=6))
        community_page.input_new_post_text(post_text)
        sleep(1)
    
        # 5. Click Post button
        community_page.click_post_button()
        sleep(2)
    
        # 6. Verify we're back to community page (post fields should be cleared)
>       assert community_page.is_community_title_present(), "Did not return to community page after posting"
